description:
Agent image tags were introduced here:
https://review.openstack.org/#/c/28676/

While the config flags work correctly, the instance metadata is not of the expected format, and so the image tags saying if the image is present is currently ignored.
title: xenapi: agent image tags ignored

comments.content:
Agent image tags were introduced here:
https://review.openstack.org/#/c/28676/

While the config flags work correctly, the instance metadata is not of the expected format, and so the image tags saying if the image is present is currently ignored.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~johngarbutt

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/32705
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/32705
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/5e0239f93407e03f45a0514c15969509931b9c9c
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 5e0239f93407e03f45a0514c15969509931b9c9c
Author: John Garbutt <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Jun 12 13:21:54 2013 +0100

    xenapi: ensure agent check respects image flags
    
    The tests assumed sys_meta was in a simpler format
    when accessed on the compute node. This change fixes
    the code to work with the actual format of sys_meta.
    
    Fixes bug 1190198
    Change-Id: I31095e25bc86c8a475a58a7325e1ff2b3ae8e15c
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
